definition: section/paragraph/funds/CL:筆|笔[bi3],個|个[ge4]/classifier for versions or models (of a product)

sentences.english: The customs may publish the failure of taxpayers to pay duty.
sentences.chinese: 海关可以对纳税义务人欠缴税款的情况予以公告。

sentences.english: There will be nomoretax-funded more tax-funded bailouts, period.
sentences.chinese: 不会有更多的税款资助的紧急援助的时期。

sentences.english: The tariff will be calculated from the date goods entered into China.
sentences.chinese: 计征税款的期限自货物放行之日起计算。
我的雇主代扣代缴税款。

sentences.english: The Obamas paid $453, 770 in total federal tax.
sentences.chinese: 总统一家共纳联邦税款为453，770美元。

sentences.english: Eliminating tax-deductible mortgage interest would add another $60,000.
sentences.chinese: 废除可抵扣税款的抵押贷款利率，又将增加6万美元。

sentences.english: It will be a huge loss to government revenue not to tax online businesses.
sentences.chinese: 若不向网上贸易征收税款，这将造成政府巨大的损失。

sentences.english: How much do you think is appropriate to charge each plastic shopping bag for the levy?
sentences.chinese: 你认为征收每个胶袋多少钱作为税款才是适合？

sentences.english: VIII. How does one calculate individual income tax for foreign currency income earned by foreign individuals?
sentences.chinese: 外籍个人取得的所得为外币的如何计算税款？

sentences.english: The competent tax authorities shall strengthen their management on the business accounting of tax deduction ledgers .
sentences.chinese: 主管税务机关应加强对税款抵扣台帐核算的管理。

sentences.english: Bonded warehouse operators must show that they have the ability to meet the Customs duties and obligations.
sentences.chinese: 保税仓库的经理人应具备向海关缴纳税款的能力。

sentences.english: The gratuitous nature of the revenue determines that the tax payment is a net outgoing of the enterprises' fiancés.
sentences.chinese: 税收的无偿性决定了税款的支付是企业资金的净流出。

sentences.english: Some online shop owners have admitted they have never paid taxes before.
sentences.chinese: 据悉，有些店主承认，过去从未交过一分钱的税款。

sentences.english: If we move too early, we will have to repay the tax.
sentences.chinese: 如果我们迁得太早，就得补交税款。

sentences.english: The customs shall, in accordance with the law, check up the payable duties of the obligatory duty payer and make them paid off.
sentences.chinese: 海关应当依法对纳税义务人的应缴税款予以清缴。

sentences.english: You have kids for the tax advantages.
sentences.chinese: 你因为可以少付税款而选择生孩子。

definition: to pay a tax one has evaded/to pay an overdue tax
